And you could just go get divorced because it was just too hard now,
instead of because there was an offense. Now, the feminist movement fought for that,

But then homosexuality, marriage rights, and then to trans rights most recently.
Right, all of that. Well, the big picture of you of that is that it used to be a package deal before
the sexual revolution. Marriage, sex, and babies was kind of a package deal. Like that's what you,
like all three of those go together. Like you don't have sex separate from marriage,
you don't have babies separate from marriage, you don't have sex outside of marriage,
all those things. And so that's part of what began to be split up during the sexual revolution

Yep. So, but here's what's important is none of those is somehow the magic sin. In fact,

and some of them, the culture was wrong on some of those topics, in my opinion.
But so I think, so something I think it's important for us to say is, is being gay,
